creator: Joe.Mudd@sas.com
text:
I am attaching a patch that has the UNIX apr_proc_mutex_trylock() support for 
some of the lock (POSIX, PROC PTHREAD, FCNTL, and FLOCK) mechanisms.

Thanks for the contribution - there are already implementations of this on the trunk.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 38758 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
